Articles.Content:
Hey everyone.

Is it just me, or is it every time I post on an interesting thread, it just dies, and no-one replies?

Don\'t believe me? Check these out:

Kerbalnaught Minecraft Skin! (Off-topic)

11:11:11:11:11 (off-topic)

A thread can be as lively as The Chancellor\'s Comedy (that scene from V for Vendetta where they play pranks on the Chancellor), but as soon as I post, it dies as fast as St. Mary\'s Virus.

Happen to anyone else?
Maybe the thread is already sick with a fatal desease when you get there and you just happen to post last.
i really don\'t know you posted on this thread and its still alive, so no you are not

Happens to anybody if they don\'t visit or post often enough - that way, you tend to post on already moribund threads, once everybody has had their say.

It also happens to people who are so wise and perceptive that every single person who reads it thinks 'oh wow, that is so true, that guy has said everything', and go away to think about what they just said so they can understand it properly, and appreciate it fully before daring to come back and try to add to the thread.

And so, with this wise and perceptive post, I will bring this thread to a graceful and magnificent close.
It\'s still opened. I will keep it open until A mod locks it.

It\'s still opened. I will keep it open until A mod locks it.

There\'s already a thread for that...
Well you posted in Metric Vs Imperial.. hopefully you can kill that one and use your powers for good.

Well you posted in Metric Vs Imperial.. hopefully you can kill that one and use your powers for good.

Will keep you posted XD

In my limited experience you post silly replies in already necro threads.

Well you posted in Metric Vs Imperial.. hopefully you can kill that one and use your powers for good.

It had already been dead for two weeks.

silly

You are a dead man.

You will never find a more serious mind.

I dare you to find a 'silly' comment.

Ha, kidding, you\'re good to go.

THEN WHO WAS PHONE?

I like PUDDING.

Who doesn\'t?

Me, actually
This happens with me too. I say things that people can\'t respond to.

It\'s so useless!

WHERES THE OVERRIDE THE OVERRIDE!?
